title: Four police officers including former Kegalle SSP arrested over Rambukkana shooting
body_lines: Former Kegalle SSP K.B. Keerthirathna and three Police Constables have been arrested by the CID in connection with the Rambukkana shooting  in which a protester was killed on April 19.

Senior Police Spokesman Ajith Rohana said based on the court order, the IGP has instructed the DIG in charge of the CID to immediately arrest the police personnel involved in the Rambukkana shooting .
Accordingly, the former SSP was arrested in Colombo while the constables were taken into the custody in Kundasale in Kandy this evening, SDIG Rohana said.

The Kegalle Magistrate on Wednesday ordered the IGP to arrest and produce the police personnel involved in the incident including those who gave orders to open fire on protesters during  Rambukkana protest.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
